Package org.moddingx.libx.registration

Class RegistrationBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.moddingx.libx.registration.RegistrationBuilder
public class RegistrationBuilder extends Object
A registration builder is used to configure the LibX registration system and adjust the behaviour of it.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RegistrationBuilder.Result
    build()
     
    void
    condition(RegistryCondition condition)
    Adds a new RegistryCondition that must match each object that is passed to the system in order to be registered.
    void
    disableRegistryTracking()
    Disables automatic registry tracking.
    void
    transformer(RegistryTransformer transformer)
    Adds a new RegistryTransformer that can add additional objects that are registered with each object registered through the LibX registration system.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegistrationBuilder

      public RegistrationBuilder()

  • Method Details

    • disableRegistryTracking

      public void disableRegistryTracking()
      Disables automatic registry tracking. That means when registering objects, Registerable.initTracking(RegistrationContext, Registerable.TrackingCollector) won't be called and ModInit won't add fields to the tracker.

    • condition

      public void condition(RegistryCondition condition)
      Adds a new RegistryCondition that must match each object that is passed to the system in order to be registered.

    • transformer

      public void transformer(RegistryTransformer transformer)
      Adds a new RegistryTransformer that can add additional objects that are registered with each object registered through the LibX registration system.

    • build

      public RegistrationBuilder.Result build()
